welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Monastir, Tunisia! Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's rich history, beautiful beaches, and vibrant culture. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and experiencing all that Monastir has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Habib Bourguiba Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal primarily used for charter and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the wifi network for free by entering their email address.

airports.airport_name: Zine El Abidine Ben Ali International Airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
